alert.note: Alert for West Jackson and West Grand Counties Above 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 03 at 9:55PM MST until December 04 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Rabbit Ears Pass. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Visibilities may drop below 1/4 mile due to falling and blowing snow. Snow covered roads will make travel hazardous. Travel may become very difficult to impossible due to heavy snowfall on roadways.
info.instruction: Persons should consider delaying all travel. If travel is absolutely necessary, drive with extreme caution. Consider taking a winter storm kit along with you, including such items as tire chains, booster cables, flashlight, shovel, blankets and extra clothing. Also take water, a first aid kit, and anything else that would help you survive in case you become stranded. Conditions will improve by Monday, although light snow showers and slick roads can still be expected.

area.areaDesc: West Jackson and West Grand Counties Above 9000 Feet
